title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
OB: No search results are displayed when searching via the Package view selection and dialog.
EB: Search results should be displayed when searching via the Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Package view. 
2. Right-click on a package and select 'Search'. 
3. In the search dialog, enter a keyword and click 'Search'. 
4. Verify that no results are displayed. 

Note: When searching for declarations, the search should first attempt to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
